meanings.definition: A person who spends the winter in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The winterer enjoyed the snowy landscape.
meanings.sent2: The winterer stayed in the cozy cabin all season.
meanings.sent3: The winterer made snow angels in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The winterer was like a bear in hibernation.
meanings.sent5: The winterer's presence brought warmth to the cold town.

meanings.definition: To spend the winter in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: They decided to winterer in the mountains this year.
meanings.sent2: She winterered in the countryside to escape the city.
meanings.sent3: We will winterer in the ski resort for a change.
meanings.sent4: The birds winterer in the south to avoid the cold.
meanings.sent5: He winterers in his hometown every year to see family.
